title: Telling Things That You Love!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>….And that’s the summary of the novel that I’ve really really been into lately<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That sounds super interesting! But, you like complicated stories too, huh, Setsuna-chan. To be honest, I didn’t quite get it on the time paradox part.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, I don’t fully understand that part of the story either. But the relationship between people is interesting without needing the logical stuff. The sometimes hot sometimes painful swaying emotions of the girl…. That’s where I get fired up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see. Certainly, I was touched by the friendship of those girls too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, I’m glad that Emma-san understands how good it is. Alright, next, let me hear about stuff that you love, Emma-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, me? I love…. school idols and bread!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>No matter when I ask you, the things that you love never change, huh, Emma-san….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ehehe~. It’s because I love them♪ But, that’s also why I’ll also talk about the same things every time…. Is that okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course. Because seeing your face when you talk about the things you love is also something that I love<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m glad~. Then, listen to my story! So~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
